"and so when he goes to the
outhouse at 10 p.m. tonight,

2690.65.text: But Abigail did not do that.

2692.28.text: She fought to save the life of Nabal.

2696.23.text:
Because Abigail knew, my job
is to be obedient to God.

2704.18.text:
And I find such
encouragement in those words.

2708.36.text: And I think that, I don't understand

2710.58.text: why God unfolded this story the way,

2712.86.text: I want Nabal to suddenly see the light

2716.05.text:
and come to know the Lord and
now worshiping and praising

2719.37.text:
and they ride off into the
sunset happily ever after.

2723.17.text: The Lord's thoughts are higher than mine,

2724.68.text: the Lord's ways are higher than mine.

2726.30.text: But it takes all the pressure off of me.

2728.26.text: I don't have to figure out anything.

2730.86.text: All I have to do is be obedient to God

2734.01.text: and God's job is everything else.

2737.82.text: Well, then David hears that Nabal has died

2745.52.text:
when David heard that
Nabal was dead, he said,

2747.45.text: "Praise be to the Lord, who has upheld

2748.99.text:
"my case against Nabal for
treating me with contempt.

2751.30.text: "He has kept his servant from doing wrong

2752.64.text:
"and brought Nabal's wrongdoing
down on his own head."

2755.02.text: Then David sent word to Abigail,

2756.81.text: asking her to become his wife!

2761.84.text: Now it gets kind of complicated

2765.78.text:
because David has some other
wives and some concubines

2768.77.text:
so it kind of becomes like
a bad Sister Wives episode,

2774.08.text: But I love that God's word

2777.43.text: doesn't tie up in a neat nice bow.

2780.93.text: Because my life never does either.

2783.27.text:
I love that His divinity
is so very willing

2787.50.text:
to enter into our humanity and
remind us that He is there.

2794.57.text: If you're physically able, will you stand

2796.54.text: as we close this session now?

2800.54.text:
I just want to read this
declaration over you

2804.56.text: has affected you in some way.

2807.55.text:
And I want to remind you and
I want to declare over you

2811.05.text:
that we have a choice and we
can make that choice today.

2815.82.text:
Are we gonna let their words
become the words of our story?

2819.45.text:
No, we want God's words
to become the words

2822.72.text: of the story that we must tell.

2827.08.text: Whatever rejection has stolen from you,

2829.85.text:
I declare that the deepest
desperation you've experienced

2833.56.text:
will lead to God's greatest
revelation in your life.

2837.61.text: I declare that the Lord will give you

2843.29.text:
He will restore you, redeem
you, and write His story,

2846.26.text:
His glorious story onto
the pages of your life.

2852.64.text: Doubt and defeat have no place

2854.53.text: in the sacred sanctuary of your heart.

2856.98.text:
Bitterness, resentment
and anger have no place

2859.45.text: in a life as beautiful as yours.

2862.46.text: From now on, when misguided voices

2864.31.text:
or the enemy himself tries
to put you down with lies

2868.11.text: or pull you away from the truth

2870.23.text:
or push you into anything that
could derail your destiny,

2873.80.text: I pray that you will sense the mighty hand

2876.83.text:
and heart of God lift
you up with His truth,

2880.29.text: draw you close with His loving tenderness,

2883.05.text: and shame Satan back to hell

2890.28.text:
Rejection, it may be a delay,
it may be a distraction,

2894.10.text: it may even be a devastation for a season

2896.51.text: but it is not your final destination.

2899.85.text:
You are destined for a love
that can never be shaken,

2906.54.text: May it be His word that becomes the word

2910.04.text:
of the story you must tell
to the glory of God Almighty.
